name: Tip Toe Thief
description:
This game was made for Bored Pixels Jam 3

Tip Toe Thief! A puzzle game full of challenges. Help our little chinchilla protagonist get to the finish line by switching off lights, setting up traps for the enemies and getting the keys to the next room. You can get spotted three times before game's over.

Controls

  • Movement: Arrow / WASD keys
  • Rock throw:  X
  • Alarm clock:  Z
  • Switch off light: Space
  • Enter: Space / Enter
